recipes.bt_go::server: Installs and configures a Go server
recipes.bt_go::agent: Installs and configures a Go agent
recipes.bt_go::default: Installs and configures a Go server and agent on the same node, for windows just agent
recipes.bt_go::agent_windows: Installs and configures Windows Go agent
recipes.bt_go::agent_linux: Install and configures Linux Go agent
